original_text:
Moirai Blaze
Lasciati trasportare in un mondo fantastico con la slot gratis Moirai Blaze con 30 paylines e generose funzioni bonus che ti offrono la possibilità di vincere alla grande! È disponibile un primo premio di 150X, e puoi scommettere ovunque da 0,30€ fino a 150,00€ per giro. Leggi la nostra recensione completa di seguito e prova la slot anche in modalità demo!
Quali sono gli elementi distintivi di Moirai Blaze?
Moirai Blaze è una bellissima slot online di Iron Dog Studio con una grafica straordinaria che porta i giocatori in un viaggio fantastico. Lo stile grafico è molto originale e ricorda molto quello del fumetto. Ai giocatori viene offerta una vasta gamma di scommesse a partire da soli 30 centesimi per giro. Visivamente, Moirai Blaze è futuristico e ha una colonna sonora molto piacevole.
Come si svolge il gioco di Moirai Blaze?
Per formare una combinazione vincente, devi far apparire 5 o più di un simbolo adiacenti l’uno all’altro, come dei cluster. Se ottieni da 21 a 49 dello stesso simbolo, vincerai 20 volte la puntata. Ora, quando ottieni una vittoria, i simboli vincenti scompaiono insieme ai simboli rimanenti che finiscono negli spazi vuoti. A questo punto, nuovi simboli scendono a cascata dall’alto regalandoti un’ulteriore possibilità di vincere fino a quando non si formano più combinazioni vincenti.
Quali sono i simboli e funzioni imperdibili in Moirai Blaze?

Il gioco è fornito di 1 simbolo Jolly che sostituisce altri simboli per aiutarti a formare combinazioni vincenti
C’è anche un’icona Jolly in espansione che compare nella prima posizione su qualsiasi bobina prendendone il controllo.

Sfrutta subito i simboli speciali

25 tumbles rilasceranno un simbolo Explorer – questo fa cadere tutti i simboli a forma di croce e diagonale o fa cadere tutti i simboli di un certo colore;
50 tumbles rilasceranno un simbolo di sostituzione Replacer – questo sostituisce tutti i simboli a forma diagonale con un certo colore o trasforma un simbolo colorato in un altro colore.
75 tumbles attiveranno la funzione Free Spins di cui ti parliamo nel prossimo paragrafo.

Come si attiva la Funzione extra Free Spins?
Dopo la riunione tra Lakshmi e Vishnu, che rappresenta una delle principali divinità dell’induismo otterrai subito 15 giri gratuiti con un moltiplicatore 1X. Durante i giri gratuiti, cerca Vishnu, perché è in grado di assegnare un moltiplicatore alle tue vincite per ogni simbolo Ganesha Powerball che ottieni: ogni volta che ne raccogli uno, il moltiplicatore aumenta di 1. Puoi anche beneficiare dei simboli speciali Explorer, Replace e Wild descritti sopra: essi esploderanno in entrambe le direzioni e sostituiranno i simboli con preziosi Jolly  per aiutarti ad aumentare il valore delle tue vincite.
Il nostro punto di vista sulla slot online Moirai Blaze
La varianza media o alta, con potenziali pagamenti di 6.000 volte la puntata per ogni giro gratuito, può risultare molto gratificante. Inoltre, l’RTP di questo gioco pari al 96,18%è di tutto rispetto. Gli aspetti vincenti sono sicuramente: i giri extra che si possono riattivare e una serie di combinazioni di puntate, che a fine partita potrebbero regalare un grandioso premio jackpot finale. Se ti è piaciuto lo stile originale di questa slot gratis, dai uno sguardo anche agli altri titoli disponibili nella vetrina virtuale Slotjava!

FAQ Moirai Blaze 
Posso giocare da cellulare a Moirai Blaze?

Certamente, come per tutte le slot gratis di Iron Dog Studio, hai la doppia scelta di gioco: su dispositivi mobili e desktop. Quindi, indipendentemente da come preferisci giocare alle slot online, avrai comunque un'ottima esperienza con un gameplay fluido.



Come si formano le combinazioni vincenti in Moirai Blaze?

Questa slot utilizza il formato Cluster Pays, dove non si hanno linee di pagamento, ma piuttosto si ottengono punti vincenti facendo girare simboli in stretta vicinanza l'uno all'altro. Per formare una vittoria in questo gioco, devi girare 5 o più dello stesso simbolo in modo che siano collegati adiacenti, o in altre parole, in modo da formare un Cluster.



Come si determinano i pagamenti in questo gioco?

Essi sono determinati dal numero di simboli coinvolti in un Cluster. La combinazione minima di qualificazione inizia con 5 simboli, che paga x2. Il rovescio della medaglia, il pagamento massimo di x400 viene dato quando si inseriscono tra 21 e 49 simboli in un cluster. Allo stesso modo, girare un Cluster da 16 a 20 simboli pagherà x200, mentre un Cluster da 12 a 15 simboli ti farà guadagnare x100. Fondamentalmente, più simboli giri, migliore sarà la ricompensa.



Quali sono le due funzionalità principali Bonus in Moirai Blaze?

Exploder, creato con 25 simboli raccolti, rimuove tutti i simboli in un modello a croce / diagonale o rimuove tutti i simboli di uno stesso tipo, lasciandosi dietro un’icona jolly; Raplacer, creato con 50 simboli raccolti, trasforma tutti i simboli in uno schema a croce / diagonale in corrispondenti o sostituisce un tipo di icona in un’altra.

raw_translation.response: Embark on a fantastical journey with the free slot game Moirai Blaze. With 30 paylines and generous bonus features that offer the chance to win big, this game offers a grand prize of 150X. Bet anywhere from €0.30 to €150.00 per spin. Moirai Blaze is a beautiful online slot by Iron Dog Studio with extraordinary graphics that bring players on a journey that is visually both original and futuristic. The music is also pleasing to the ear. To form a winning combination, players must have 5 or more adjacent symbols in a cluster. Winning symbols disappear along with remaining symbols, and new symbols cascade from the top, giving players another chance to win until no more winning combinations appear. There are various special symbols and features in Moirai Blaze, including a wild symbol and an expanding wild symbol that appears in the first position on any reel. Take advantage of these symbols, such as the Explorer symbol that drops all symbols that are diagonal or form a cross. The Replacer symbol also replaces all symbols diagonally or transforms a colored symbol into another colored symbol. With 75 tumbles, activating the Free Spins feature offers 15 free spins with a 1X multiplier. During free spins, Vishnu assigns a multiplier to winnings for each Ganesha Powerball symbol obtained. Furthermore, players can benefit from the Explorer, Replace, and Wild symbols, as they explode in both directions, replacing symbols with valuable Jolly to help increase the value of your winnings. Overall, Moirai Blaze offers a high variance, with potential payouts of 6,000 times the bet for each free spin, and a respectable RTP of 96.18%. Experience this original slot game, and be sure to check out the other available titles in the virtual Slotjava showcase. Play on your mobile device or desktop, and enjoy a smooth gameplay experience.

raw_translation.response:
Moirai Blaze: A Gamble Worth Taking

Experience a breathtaking adventure with Moirai Blaze, a free slot game with 30 paylines and lucrative bonus features that offer you the chance to win big! With a top prize of 150X, you can bet anywhere from €0.30 to €150.00 per spin. Read our full review below and try the slot in demo mode!

What makes Moirai Blaze stand out?

Moirai Blaze, an online slot game developed by Iron Dog Studio, is visually stunning with outstanding graphics that transport players to a fantastic world. The graphics are truly original and reminiscent of a comic book. Players have a wide range of betting options starting at just 30 cents per spin. Visually, Moirai Blaze is futuristic and has a very pleasant soundtrack.

How does Moirai Blaze gameplay work?

To form a winning combination, you must land 5 or more adjacent symbols, forming what is called a cluster. If you land between 21 to 49 of the same symbol, you win 20 times your wager. When you win, the winning symbols disappear along with the remaining ones that fall into empty spaces. New symbols then cascade from above, giving you an additional chance to win until no more winning combinations are formed.

What are the essential symbols and features of Moirai Blaze?

The game offers 1 Wild symbol that substitutes for all others to help you form winning combinations. There is also an expanding Wild icon that appears in the first position on any reel, taking control of it.

Take advantage of the special symbols

25 tumbles release an Explorer symbol - this causes all cross and diagonal-shaped symbols to fall or all symbols of a certain color to fall;
50 tumbles release a Replacer symbol - this replaces all diagonal-shaped symbols of a certain color or transforms a colored symbol into another color.
75 tumbles activate the Free Spins feature that we describe in the next paragraph.

How do you activate the Free Spins extra feature?

After the meeting between Lakshmi and Vishnu, one of the main deities of Hinduism, you immediately get 15 free spins with a 1X multiplier. During the free spins, look for Vishnu, who can assign a multiplier to your winnings for every Ganesha Powerball symbol you land: every time you collect one, the multiplier increases by 1. You can also benefit from the special Explorer, Replace, and Wild symbols described above: they will explode in both directions, replacing symbols with valuable Wilds to help you increase the value of your winnings.

Our view of the Moirai Blaze online slot

The medium to high variance, with potential payouts of 6,000 times your wager per free spin, can be very rewarding. Additionally, the game's RTP of 96.18% is respectable. The winning aspects are undoubtedly the re-triggerable extra spins and a series of betting combinations that could result in a grand jackpot prize at the end of the game. If you enjoyed the original style of this free slot, check out the other titles available in the Slotjava virtual showcase!

Moirai Blaze FAQ
Can I play Moirai Blaze on my mobile?

Certainly, as with all Iron Dog Studio free slots, you have the choice of playing on mobile devices and desktop. Regardless of how you prefer to play online slots, you will still have an excellent experience with smooth gameplay.

How are winning combinations formed in Moirai Blaze?

This slot uses the Cluster Pays format, where there are no paylines, but rather, winning points are obtained by spinning symbols that are in close proximity to each other. To form a win in this game, you must land 5 or more of the same symbol in a way that they are adjacent, or in other words, to form a cluster.

How are payouts determined in this game?

They are determined by the number of symbols involved in a cluster. The minimum qualifying combination starts with 5 symbols, which pays x2. On the flip side, the maximum payout of x400 is given when you land between 21 and 49 symbols in a cluster. Similarly, spinning a 16 to 20 symbol cluster will pay x200, while a 12 to 15 symbol cluster will earn you x100. Basically, the more symbols you spin, the better the reward.

What are the two main Bonus features in Moirai Blaze?

Exploder, created with 25 collected symbols, removes all symbols in a cross/diagonal pattern or removes all symbols of the same kind, leaving behind a Wild icon; Replacer, created with 50 collected symbols, transforms all symbols in a cross/diagonal pattern into matching ones or replaces one type of icon with another.

Certainly, as with all Iron Dog Studio free slots, you have the choice of playing on mobile devices and desktop. Regardless of how you prefer to play online slots, you will still have an excellent experience with smooth gameplay.

How are winning combinations formed in Moirai Blaze?

This slot uses the Cluster Pays format, where there are no paylines, but rather, winning points are obtained by spinning symbols that are in close proximity to each other. To form a win in this game, you must land 5 or more of the same symbol in a way that they are adjacent, or in other words, to form a cluster.

How are payouts determined in this game?

They are determined by the number of symbols involved in a cluster. The minimum qualifying combination starts with 5 symbols, which pays x2. On the flip side, the maximum payout of x400 is given when you land between 21 and 49 symbols in a cluster. Similarly, spinning a 16 to 20 symbol cluster will pay x200, while a 12 to 15 symbol cluster will earn you x100. Basically, the more symbols you spin, the better the reward.

What are the two main Bonus features in Moirai Blaze?

Exploder, created with 25 collected symbols, removes all symbols in a cross/diagonal pattern or removes all symbols of the same kind, leaving behind a Wild icon; Replacer, created with 50 collected symbols, transforms all symbols in a cross/diagonal pattern into matching ones or replaces one type of icon with another.

Review: Moirai Blaze: A Gamble Worth Taking

Experience a breathtaking adventure with Moirai Blaze, a free slot game with 30 paylines and lucrative bonus features that offer you the chance to win big! With a top prize of 150X, you can bet anywhere from €0.30 to €150.00 per spin. Read our full review below and try the slot in demo mode!

What makes Moirai Blaze stand out?

Moirai Blaze, an online slot game developed by Iron Dog Studio, is visually stunning with outstanding graphics that transport players to a fantastic world. The graphics are truly original and reminiscent of a comic book. Players have a wide range of betting options starting at just 30 cents per spin. Visually, Moirai Blaze is futuristic and has a very pleasant soundtrack.

How does Moirai Blaze gameplay work?

To form a winning combination, you must land 5 or more adjacent symbols, forming what is called a cluster. If you land between 21 to 49 of the same symbol, you win 20 times your wager. When you win, the winning symbols disappear along with the remaining ones that fall into empty spaces. New symbols then cascade from above, giving you an additional chance to win until no more winning combinations are formed.

What are the essential symbols and features of Moirai Blaze?

The game offers 1 Wild symbol that substitutes for all others to help you form winning combinations. There is also an expanding Wild icon that appears in the first position on any reel, taking control of it.

Take advantage of the special symbols

25 tumbles release an Explorer symbol - this causes all cross and diagonal-shaped symbols to fall or all symbols of a certain color to fall;
50 tumbles release a Replacer symbol - this replaces all diagonal-shaped symbols of a certain color or transforms a colored symbol into another color.
75 tumbles activate the Free Spins feature that we describe in the next paragraph.

How do you activate the Free Spins extra feature?

After the meeting between Lakshmi and Vishnu, one of the main deities of Hinduism, you immediately get 15 free spins with a 1X multiplier. During the free spins, look for Vishnu, who can assign a multiplier to your winnings for every Ganesha Powerball symbol you land: every time you collect one, the multiplier increases by 1. You can also benefit from the special Explorer, Replace, and Wild symbols described above: they will explode in both directions, replacing symbols with valuable Wilds to help you increase the value of your winnings.

Our view of the Moirai Blaze online slot

The medium to high variance, with potential payouts of 6,000 times your wager per free spin, can be very rewarding. Additionally, the game's RTP of 96.18% is respectable. The winning aspects are undoubtedly the re-triggerable extra spins and a series of betting combinations that could result in a grand jackpot prize at the end of the game. If you enjoyed the original style of this free slot, check out the other titles available in the Slotjava virtual showcase!
